sentences.sContent: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.sCn: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.sContent: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.sCn: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.sContent: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.sCn: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.sContent: Well, I may have been wrong.
They may have called while you were out.
sentences.sCn: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.sContent: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.sCn: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.sContent: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.sCn: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

sentences.sContent: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.sCn: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.sContent: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.sCn: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

sentences.sContent: ...And you may even spot the highway or railroad from this point...
...Normal forgetting may even be a safety mechanism to ensure our brain doesn’t become too full...
...Some scholars think teamwork may not always be reliable...
...The vast bulk of the research shows that there may be a pause...
...High-flyers forced to work in teams may be undervalued and free-riders empowered...
...Too many of us may be paying for one thing...
...Teams are not always the answer—teams may provide insight...
...While it may sound like an advantage to many...
...Avoiding conflicts may have helped dogs develop better bonds with humans...

phrases.pCn: 很可能；充分理由；有充分理由可以…
要我帮忙吗；请问买什么（商场用语）
但愿如此（《魔戒首部曲》主题曲）
n. 五月皇后（被选为五朔节庆祝活动女王的少女）
飞越来生缘；美梦成真（电影名称）

words.tran: 可以；或许（may的过去式）；应该

trans.tranOther: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain
